participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and passionate about photography, but struggles with motivation.
participant_1.background: My biggest animal sighting was a great white shark swimming beside our boat off the coast of South Africa. I am a vet tech. Photography is my passion, but I could never do it if I were blind because it requires a keen sense of sight to capture the perfect shot. I've been married for five years.

participant_2.name: James
participant_2.personality: Organized and loves pets, enjoys a structured life to counter stress.
participant_2.background: I find my well-organized life to be a stress reliever after a busy day. I love my pets because they are always there to greet me when I come home from work. I have trouble finding shoes that fit my big, six-toed foot. I live in a medium sized city.

content.text: It's going good! Just got back from a trip to South Africa.
Oh wow, that sounds amazing! I've always wanted to go there. What was your favorite part?
I saw a great white shark swimming right beside our boat! It was incredible.
That's so cool! I've always been scared of sharks, but that would be an amazing experience.
It was definitely scary, but it was also really exciting.
What do you do for a living?
Oh cool! I love animals. Do you have any pets?
Aww, that's awesome. I have a cat and a dog.
Sounds like we have a lot in common.
We do! It's nice to meet you.
